de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids.integer

Class ArrayModifiableIntegerDBIDs

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids.integer.ArrayModifiableIntegerDBIDs
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArrayDBIDs, ArrayModifiableDBIDs, DBIDs, IntegerArrayDBIDs, IntegerDBIDs, ModifiableDBIDs

    class ArrayModifiableIntegerDBIDs
extends Object
implements ArrayModifiableDBIDs, IntegerArrayDBIDs
    Class using a primitive int[] array as storage.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • binarySearch

        public int binarySearch(DBIDRef key)
        Description copied from interface: ArrayDBIDs
        Search for the position of the given key, assuming that the data set is sorted. For keys not found, -(1+insertion position) is returned, as for Java Collections.binarySearch(java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>>, T)
        Specified by:
        binarySearch in interface ArrayDBIDs
        Parameters:
        key - Key to search for
        Returns:
        Offset of key

      • iter

        public ArrayModifiableIntegerDBIDs.Itr iter()
        Description copied from interface: ModifiableDBIDs
        Get a modifiable DBID iterator (a more efficient API). usage example: 
         
 for(DBIDMIter iter = ids.iter(); iter.valid(); iter.advance()) {
   DBID id = iter.getDBID();
   iter.remove();
 }
        Specified by:
        iter in interface ArrayDBIDs
